fullText: The musical adaptation of S.E. Hinton's beloved novel captures the story's emotional core while adding layers of theatrical magic that make familiar characters feel fresh again.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of S.E. Hinton's beloved novel captures the story's emotional core while adding layers of theatrical magic that make familiar characters feel fresh again.

keyPhrases.quote: make familiar characters feel fresh again
